channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HONOR 7 Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HONOR 7 Lite

item.title: CVE-2017-8206|2024-09-16T19:47:01.452Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- honor%207%20lite
item.description: HONOR 7 Lite mobile phones with software of versions earlier than NEM-L21C432B352 have an App Lock bypass vulnerability. An attacker could perform specific operations to bypass the App Lock to use apps on a target mobile phone temporarily.
